sources.name: Employees
sources.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		RegionCode as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		FunctionCode as string,
		GradeLevel as string,
		RoleCode as string,
		StartDt as string,
		EndDt as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Employees

sources.name: DimEmployees
sources.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		RegionCode as string,
		StatusCode as string,
		FunctionCode as string,
		GradeLevel as string,
		RoleCode as string,
		StartDt as string,
		EndDt as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> DimEmployees

transformations.name: Exists1
transformations.script:
Employees, TypeConversions exists(rowhash == rowhash2,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'none')~> Exists1
